action.action-desc: Mr. Van Drew introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend titles XIX and XXI of the Social Security Act to prohibit Federal financial participation under Medicaid and CHIP for individuals without verified citizenship, nationality, or satisfactory immigration status.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Medicaid for Illegals Act.

section.header: Prohibiting Federal financial participation under Medicaid and CHIP for individuals without verified citizenship, nationality, or satisfactory immigration status

paragraph.text: Section 1903(i)(22) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396b(i)(22)) is amended—

clause.text: the period in which the individual is provided the reasonable opportunity to present satisfactory documentary evidence of citizenship or nationality under section 1902(ee)(2)(C) or subsection (x)(4);

subparagraph.text: Section 1902(a)(46)(C) shall apply to States under this title in the same manner as it applies to a State under title XIX.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply beginning on the date of the enactment of this Act.
